name: azure-flute
short_effect: Allows entry into the Hall of Origin. Unreleased.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A flute that puts out echoing sounds that do not seem to be of this world. No one knows who made it.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A flute that puts out echoing sounds that do not seem to be of this world. No one knows who made it.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A flute that puts out echoing sounds that do not seem to be of this world. No one knows who made it.
